directions: Place avocado, banana, soy milk, cocoa powder, agave nectar, lemon juice, and coconut into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Divide into small containers, and store in the refrigerator 1 hour until set.
ingredients: 1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and cut into chunks
1 banana, peeled and cut into chunks
title: Alex's Raw Chocolate Pudding
